flavorText: "Leave the door to the past even slightly ajar and it could be blown off its hinges."

foreignData.flavorText: „Es reicht schon, die Tür zur Vergangenheit nur ein klein wenig offen zu lassen, damit sie ganz aus ihren Angeln gehoben werden kann."
foreignData.name: Zurückerinnern
foreignData.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl mischt seinen Friedhof in seine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText: "Si dejas la puerta al pasado aunque sea un poquito entreabierta, podrían arrancarla de sus goznes".
foreignData.name: Rememorar
foreignData.text: El jugador objetivo baraja su cementerio en su biblioteca.

foreignData.flavorText: « Si vous laissez la porte du passé entr'ouverte, elle ne demandera qu'à s'ouvrir. »
foreignData.name: Réminiscence
foreignData.text: Le joueur ciblé mélange son cimetière à sa bibliothèque.

foreignData.flavorText: "Basta lasciare uno spiraglio nella porta sul passato perché venga scardinata".
foreignData.name: Reminiscenza
foreignData.text: Il giocatore bersaglio rimescola il proprio cimitero nel proprio grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: "Deixe a porta para o passado levemente entreaberta e ela poderá ser arrancada de suas dobradiças."
foreignData.name: Entregar-se a Reminescências
foreignData.text: O jogador alvo embaralha seu próprio cemitério em seu próprio grimório.

name: Reminisce
originalText: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

rulings.text: This card won't be put into your graveyard until after it's finished resolving, which means it won't be shuffled into your library as part of its own effect.

text: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
